# str-tab

The str-tab is a child component of a str-tab. 

> Note: This component should only be used with vanilla or Stencil JavaScript projects. For Angular, React, and Vue apps you do not need to use `str-tab` to declare your tab components.

See the [str-tabs](../tabs) for configuration details.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property           | Attribute | Description                                                                                                                               | Type     | Default     |
| ------------------ | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `tab` _(required)_ | `tab`     | A tab id must be provided for each `str-tab`. It's used internally to reference the selected tab or by the router to switch between them. | `string` | `undefined` |
